name: Trooper
description: Standard enemy with weak armor. Vulnerable to bullets from all directions.

name: Factory Strider
description: The Factory Striders are giant, heavily armed behemoths of steel and socialism.

name: Commissar
description: Capable of calling reinforcements. Weak everywhere, but can increase enemy numbers quickly.

name: Scout Strider
description: Medium armored enemy; hit the controller robot at the back for quick takedown.

name: Berserker
description: Aggressive fighter with weaknesses in the head and red chest.

name: Devastator
description: Medium armored with vulnerable head and abdomen. Disabling the arms reduces weapon capability.

name: Hulk
description: High damage output and medium armor; target the arms and back to disable.

name: Tank
description: Heavily armored Automaton. Weak against explosives and strategic attacks.

name: Orbital Laser
description: The Destroyer's laser cannon sweeps the designated area, vaporizing all targets within the effective radius.

name: Eagle Airstrike
description: A barrage of bombs creating a carpet of explosions over the battlefield, effective for large target areas.

name: Jump Pack
description: Enables the user to jump higher than normal, increasing mobility on the battlefield.

name: Reinforce
description: Calls in reinforcements to the battlefield, bringing additional Helldivers to support.

name: Orbital Railcannon Strike
description: Fires a high-velocity railcannon round at the largest target near the beacon, targeting automatically.

name: Tesla Tower
description: Deploys a tower that emits electrical charges at close-range targets, effective against unarmored foes.

name: Orbital 120mm HE Barrage
description: A precise artillery salvo over a small area, suitable for dealing with concentrated enemy units.

name: Orbital Gas Strike
description: Releases a corrosive gas cloud, effective against organic and robotic enemies.

name: Orbital Smoke Strike
description: Creates a large smoke screen to obstruct line of sight, perfect for tactical retreats or cover.

name: E/MG-101 HMG Emplacement
description: A fortified heavy machine gun emplacement, ideal against lightly armored enemies.

name: Exo-45 Patriot Exosuit
description: A powerful exosuit with a heavy machine gun and rocket launcher, built for sustained fire.

name: Resupply
description: Deploys ammunition and supplies, allowing Helldivers to restock during extended engagements.

name: Orbital Walking Barrage
description: A moving artillery barrage that forces enemies to vacate cover, ideal for advancing under fire.

name: A/MLS-4X Rocket Sentry
description: An automated turret equipped with rockets, targeting primarily larger and armored threats.

name: SOS Beacon
description: Signals for extraction or reinforcements, essential for emergency situations.

name: A/AC-8 Autocannon Sentry
description: A high-powered autocannon sentry with long-range anti-tank capabilities.

name: FX-12 Shield Generator Relay
description: Creates a stationary energy shield for temporary cover against projectile attacks.

name: ARC-3 Arc Thrower
description: Emits electrical charges in an arc, effective at stunning multiple close-range targets.

name: GL-21 Grenade Launcher
description: A grenade launcher effective against armored infantry, designed for explosive crowd control.

name: EAT-17 Expendable Anti-Tank
description: A single-use weapon specialized for damaging vehicle armor, discarded after every use.

name: FAF-14 Spear
description: An anti-tank homing missile that locks onto targets before launch, perfect for large foes.

name: FLAM-40 Flamethrower
description: An incendiary weapon designed for close-range combat, effective against both organic and robotic targets.

name: RS-422 Railgun
description: An experimental weapon that prioritizes armor penetration, requires charging between shots.

name: A/G-16 Gatling Sentry
description: An automated turret with a high rate of fire, providing relentless suppressive fire.

name: A/M-12 Mortar Sentry
description: A turret that fires powerful shells in a high arc, effective for striking targets behind cover.

name: Scavenger
description: Grunt of the Terminid forces, calls reinforcements with a scream if alerted.

name: Bile Spitter
description: Variant of Scavenger that spits bile to slow down enemies.

name: Pouncer
description: A swift Scavenger that can leap long distances to reach targets.

name: Warrior
description: An armored Terminid that requires precise shots to its weak points.

name: Bile Warrior
description: A Warrior variant that explodes in a cloud of bile upon death.

name: Hunter
description: Speedy Terminid that dodges attacks and lunges at targets.

name: Stalker
description: Terminid that camouflages with its surroundings and attacks from a distance.

name: Bile Spewer
description: A Terminid that shoots bile like a mortar, posing a serious threat.

name: Charger
description: A heavily armored and aggressive Terminid, best stunned before attacking.

name: AR-23 Liberator
description: A versatile assault rifle that balances fire rate and damage.

name: AR-23P Liberator Penetrator
description: A variant of the Liberator with enhanced penetration capabilities.

name: AR-23C Liberator Concussive
description: A concussive version that deals extra knockback damage.

name: BR-14 Adjudicator
description: A burst-fire rifle known for its accuracy and stopping power.

name: SG-8 Punisher
description: A powerful shotgun designed for close-range encounters.

name: SG-8S Slugger
description: A shotgun variant that fires slugs for increased damage at range.

name: SG-225 Breaker
description: A versatile shotgun effective against both enemies and barricades.

name: SG-225IE Breaker Incendiary
description: A Breaker variant that fires incendiary rounds.

name: SG-225SP Breaker Spray&Pray
description: A fully automatic shotgun designed for relentless fire.

name: MP-98 Knight
description: A reliable submachine gun with a high rate of fire.

name: SMG-37 Defender
description: An SMG designed for defensive combat with moderate damage.

name: Pummeler
description: A close-quarters weapon known for its high impact.

name: R-63 Diligence
description: A tactical rifle that excels in sustained fire scenarios.

name: R-63CS Diligence Counter Sniper
description: A precision version of the Diligence designed for counter-sniper roles.

name: LAS-5 Scythe
description: A laser weapon that deals continuous damage, ideal for taking down tough foes.

name: LAS-16 Sickle
description: An advanced laser weapon with high accuracy for mid-range engagements.

name: PLAS-1 Scorcher
description: A plasma weapon that incinerates enemies with high damage output.

name: SG-8P Punisher Plasma
description: A plasma variant of the Punisher, effective against both organic and mechanical foes.

name: ARC-12 Blitzer
description: A weapon that delivers electrical charges to stun enemies and cause damage.

name: JAR-5
description: An experimental weapon with unpredictable firing patterns.

name: R-36 Eruptor
description: An explosive weapon designed for area damage, effective against groups of enemies.

name: CB-9 Crossbow
description: A silent weapon capable of firing bolts with high penetration power.
